snippet: The soprano Guanqun Yu was part of a cast made up largely of singers unknown even to regular operagoers at the season premiere of Verdi’s “Trovatore” at the Met.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Verdi's Il Trovatore with soprano Guanqun Yu.
lead_paragraph: The soprano Guanqun Yu was part of a cast made up largely of singers unknown even to regular operagoers at the season premiere of Verdi’s “Trovatore” at the Met.

headline.main: Cast of Unknowns Swept Along by the Verdian High Tides
headline.print_headline: Cast of Unknowns Swept Along By the Verdian High Tides
